commandDescription: Creates a testSuite-meta.xml file with the provided list of tests.
nameFlagDescription: Comma separated list of tests names that will be used to create the test suite. If none are provided you will be asked to provide a list or exit.
urlonlyFlagDescription: Optional: Provide if you would like to define the name of your test suite. Default: name of current branch minus 'feature/'
classicFlagDescription: Optional: Provide if you would like to save the testSuite-meta.xml file to a location other than force-app/main/default/testSuites
